short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter out negative Reddit comments for a more mindful and pleasant viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MoodMinder uses sentiment analysis to filter out negative comments on Reddit for a more pleasant viewing experience. You can choose to either blur negative comments (which provides the option of unblurring selected comments), or completely hide negative comments). For reddit viewers, content creators or parental control.
